data.text: @Brandon_Beaber After vaccination where the patient came Covid-19 positive (post vaccination) within 3 days.
@Brandon_Beaber Vaccine.  Have see multiple pulmonary embolism cases within a two week period post vaccine with no prior or family history.
@Brandon_Beaber Similar case was admitted and treated by me. A case report has been finished but couldnâ€™t manage to publish it yet. https://t.co/I9HUP6TPmf
There are rare reports of cerebellitis after covid-19 infection, so it is possible this is a rare idiosyncratic reaction to the spike protein.  https://t.co/Rsym7t3CLd
